channel.title: Projects on Vidya Mani
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Vidya Mani

item.title: BERT Based Semantic Search
item.description: Abstract Implemented a BERT-based semantic search engine to enhance the accuracy and relevance of search results by understanding contextual nuances in queries and documents.

item.title: Image Captioning
item.description: Abstract Built an automatic image captioning application by combining CNN and RNN architectures, enhancing computer vision tasks. Read More

item.title: Multimodal Image Search Using Transformer-Based Architectures
item.description: Abstract An image search system using a multimodal large language model trained with CLIP to map text and images into a shared embedding space for accurate retrieval based on textual queries. Watch Demo

item.title: Network Node Discovery
item.description: Abstract Network connectivity discovery is an extensively studied area, and there are many interesting mechanisms such as ping, traceroute, DNS, address resolution protocol (ARP), and SNMP available to discover network elements and the connectivity among them. Traceroute is a computer network diagnostic tool for displaying the route (path) and measuring transit delays of packets across an Internet Protocol (IP) network. Read More

item.title: Object Tracking using SLAM
item.description: Abstract Implemented SLAM to localize a robot and build an environmental map using sensor data. Read More

item.title: Semantic Search Using SOLR
item.description: Abstract Implemented a semantic search engine on a News Corpus, which will produce enhanced search results based on semantics. This can be achieved using various natural language Processing features and techniques. This project has to use a keyword-based strategy. Read More
